scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy jetstreamgg/sky-subgraph-mainnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://deploy-subgraph-staging.sky.money/ -l 0.1.0
scripts.deploy:mainnet:prod: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy jetstreamgg/sky-subgraph-mainnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://deploy-subgraph.sky.money/ -l 0.1.0
